Name: Neon Outlast
About the game: This is a Challenging FPS game which you can act as a soldier, who lost in the slum and surrounded by terrorists, all you have to do is breakthrough all the enemies and escape in the limited time. Features: A weapon rack(shop) in the shooting range, 7 firearms in total. Airdrop will be dropped in the slum. Terrorist will drop cash when they dies. If you didn't make it you can take your cash to next round. Challenging AI to train your aim. Escape the slum in the limited time.
